channel.title: Theme on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Theme on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Theme change
item.description: I’m testing out Scott Allan Wallick’s blog.txt theme. I’m a huge fan of Sandbox and this is very impressive too. Minimalist but attractive. It is also highly configurable and has lots of hAtom and hCard goodness built-in. I prefer it to the old one we had here. Thoughts anyone?
